title: sticky notifications
body:
**Describe the bug**
Many times I have the notification icon (counter) without actually have anything new in the app. It happens after real notifications which are not cleaned after I read the message.  I have to restart the app to remove these notifications.

**To Reproduce**
I am not sure, but it happens almost daily, some notifications just not cleaned up.

**Expected behavior**
Ideally I wouldn't have any ghost notification, but I would be already happy if the scroll down menu would offer a restart option ("refresh" does not help).

**Screenshots**
If applicable, add screenshots to help explain your problem.

**Desktop (please complete the following information):**
 - OS: Ubuntu 24.04
 - Installation package: snap
 - Version: 1.11.2 (but it's not new issue, I had it with many of the previous versions too)

**Additional context**
Can we just have a restart button?
